languages.text: "Я тестировала исправность вокс-устройств корабельного реликвария. Запись сообщений работает, удаление — нет. С вашей помощью теперь я это знаю, благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "Я тестировала исправность вокс-систем корабельного реликвария. Запись сообщений работает, удаление — нет. С вашей помощью теперь я это знаю, благодарю".

languages.text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."
languages.original_text: "Я тестировала исправность вокс-устройств корабельного реликвария. Запись сообщений работает, удаление — нет. С вашей помощью теперь я это знаю, благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message delivery works but deletion doesn't. You've helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message delivery works but deletion doesn't. You've helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message delivery works but deletion doesn't. You've helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."
"I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

languages.text: « Je vérifiais le bon fonctionnement des appareils vox dans le reliquaire du vaisseau. Il s'avère que l'enregistrement est opérationnel, mais pas la suppression. Merci de m'avoir aidé à m'en rendre compte. »
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: « Je vérifiais le bon fonctionnement des appareils vox dans le reliquaire du vaisseau. Il s'avère que la transmission est opérationnelle, mais pas la suppression. Merci de m'avoir aidé à m'en rendre compte. »

languages.text: «Estaba comprobando errores en los dispositivos de voco del relicario de la nave. La grabación de mensajes funciona, pero la eliminación no. Gracias por ayudarme a confirmarlo».
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba comprobando errores en los dispositivos de voco del relicario de la nave. El envío de mensajes funciona, pero la eliminación no. Gracias por ayudarme a confirmarlo».

languages.text: “我当时正在这艘船的圣骨匣处检查音阵装置的故障。看来音阵录音功能没有任何问题，但删除功能出现了故障。您帮我确认了问题所在，谢谢您。”
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: “我当时正在这艘船的圣骨匣处检查音阵装置的故障。看来音阵信息的传输没有任何问题，但删除功能出现了故障。您帮我确认了问题所在，谢谢您。”

languages.text: 「船内の聖骨箱にあるヴォクス・デバイスを確認していました。メッセージの録音はできますが、削除できないことが、あなたのおかげで分かりました。ありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: 「船内の聖骨箱にあるヴォクス・デバイスを確認していました。メッセージの録音はできますが、削除できないことが、あなたのおかげで分かりました。ありがとうございます」

languages.text: "Ich habe die Vox-Geräte im Reliquiar des Schiffs auf Fehler überprüft. Die Aufzeichnung von Nachrichten funktioniert, das Löschen nicht. Ihr habt mir geholfen, das festzustellen. Danke."
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Vox-Geräte im Reliquiar des Schiffs auf Fehler überprüft. Das Versenden von Nachrichten funktioniert, das Löschen jedoch nicht. Ihr habt mir geholfen, das festzustellen. Danke."

languages.text: "Geminin kutsal emanet odasındaki voks cihazlarında arıza kontrolü yapıyordum. Mesaj kaydı çalışıyor ancak silme çalışmıyormuş. Bunu tespit etmemde yardımcı oldunuz. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "I was fault-checking the vox-devices in the ship's reliquary. Message recording works but deletion does not. You have helped me establish that. Thank you."
